tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_reviews (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR,
  game_title VARCHAR,
  review_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  date_posted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  review_score INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE
);
